name: Krelm's Buff Belt
flavorText: “Whereupon having vanquished the Oglak beast that had devoured a ten-stone weight worth of villagers, didst they hitherto beseech Krelm the Immodest to remain henceforth as the village champion and erected a statue to honor his name hereinafter.” -Excerpt from Stories Meant to Frighten Small Children
flavorTextHtml: “Whereupon having vanquished the Oglak beast that had devoured a ten-stone weight worth of villagers, didst they hitherto beseech Krelm the Immodest to remain henceforth as the village champion and erected a statue to honor his name hereinafter.” -Excerpt from Stories Meant to Frighten Small Children

secondary.textHtml: Gain 25% run speed. This effect is lost for 5 seconds after taking damage.
